verses.text_plain: For, behold, in those days, and in that time, when I shall bring again the captivity of Judah and Jerusalem,
verses.verse_html: 1For, behold, in those days, and in that time, when I shall bring again the captivity of Judah and Jerusalem,

verses.text_plain: I will also gather all nations, and will bring them down into the valley of Jehoshaphat, and will plead with them there for my people and for my heritage Israel, whom they have scattered among the nations, and parted my land.
verses.verse_html: 2I will also gather all nations, and will bring them down into the valley of Jehoshaphat, and will plead with them there for my people and for my heritage Israel, whom they have scattered among the nations, and parted my land.

tokens.text: with them there for my people

verses.text_plain: And they have cast lots for my people; and have given a boy for an harlot, and sold a girl for wine, that they might drink.
verses.verse_html: 3And they have cast lots for my people; and have given a boy for an harlot, and sold a girl for wine, that they might drink.

verses.text_plain: Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O Tyre, and Zidon, and all the coasts of Palestine? will ye render me a recompence? and if ye recompense me, swiftly and speedily will I return your recompence upon your own head;
verses.verse_html: 4Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O Tyre, and Zidon, and all the coasts of Palestine? will ye render me a recompence? and if ye recompense me, swiftly and speedily will I return your recompence upon your own head;

tokens.text: Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O Tyre

verses.text_plain: Because ye have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried into your temples my goodly pleasant things:
verses.verse_html:
5Because ye have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried into your temples my goodly pleasant things: ▼
▼ pleasant: Heb. desirable

verses.text_plain: The children also of Judah and the children of Jerusalem have ye sold unto the Grecians, that ye might remove them far from their border.
verses.verse_html:
6The children also of Judah and the children of Jerusalem have ye sold unto the Grecians, that ye might remove them far from their border. ▼
▼ the Grecians: Heb. the sons of the Grecians

tokens.text: that ye might remove them far

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the Grecians: Heb. the sons of the Grecians
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the Grecians: Heb. the sons of the Grecians

verses.text_plain: Behold, I will raise them out of the place whither ye have sold them, and will return your recompence upon your own head:
verses.verse_html: 7Behold, I will raise them out of the place whither ye have sold them, and will return your recompence upon your own head:

verses.text_plain: And I will sell your sons and your daughters into the hand of the children of Judah, and they shall sell them to the Sabeans, to a people far off: for the Lord hath spoken it.
verses.verse_html: 8And I will sell your sons and your daughters into the hand of the children of Judah, and they shall sell them to the Sabeans, to a people far off: for the Lord hath spoken it.

verses.text_plain: Proclaim ye this among the Gentiles; Prepare war, wake up the mighty men, let all the men of war draw near; let them come up:
verses.verse_html:
9Proclaim ye this among the Gentiles; Prepare war, wake up the mighty men, let all the men of war draw near; let them come up: ▼
▼ Prepare: Heb. Sanctify

verses.text_plain: Beat your plowshares into swords, and your pruninghooks into spears: let the weak say, I am strong.
verses.verse_html:
10Beat your plowshares into swords, and your pruninghooks into spears: let the weak say, I am strong. ▼
▼ pruninghooks: or, scythes

verses.text_plain: Assemble yourselves, and come, all ye heathen, and gather yourselves together round about: thither cause thy mighty ones to come down, O Lord.
verses.verse_html:
11Assemble yourselves, and come, all ye heathen, and gather yourselves together round about: thither cause thy mighty ones to come down, O Lord. ▼
▼ cause…: or, the Lord shall bring down

footnotes.body_text: ▼ cause…: or, the Lord shall bring down
footnotes.body_html: ▼ cause…: or, the Lord shall bring down

verses.text_plain: Let the heathen be wakened, and come up to the valley of Jehoshaphat: for there will I sit to judge all the heathen round about.
verses.verse_html: 12Let the heathen be wakened, and come up to the valley of Jehoshaphat: for there will I sit to judge all the heathen round about.

verses.text_plain: Put ye in the sickle, for the harvest is ripe: come, get you down; for the press is full, the fats overflow; for their wickedness is great.
verses.verse_html: 13Put ye in the sickle, for the harvest is ripe: come, get you down; for the press is full, the fats overflow; for their wickedness is great.

verses.text_plain: Multitudes, multitudes in the valley of decision: for the day of the Lord is near in the valley of decision.
verses.verse_html:
14Multitudes, multitudes in the valley of decision: for the day of the Lord is near in the valley of decision. ▼
▼ decision: or, concision, or, threshing

footnotes.body_html: ▼ decision: or, concision, or, threshing

verses.text_plain: The sun and the moon shall be darkened, and the stars shall withdraw their shining.
verses.verse_html: 15The sun and the moon shall be darkened, and the stars shall withdraw their shining.

verses.text_plain: The Lord also shall roar out of Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth shall shake: but the Lord will be the hope of his people, and the strength of the children of Israel.
verses.verse_html:
16The Lord also shall roar out of Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth shall shake: but the Lord will be the hope of his people, and the strength of the children of Israel. ▼
▼ hope: Heb. place of repair, or, harbour

footnotes.body_text: ▼ hope: Heb. place of repair, or, harbour
footnotes.body_html: ▼ hope: Heb. place of repair, or, harbour

verses.text_plain: So shall ye know that I am the Lord your God dwelling in Zion, my holy mountain: then shall Jerusalem be holy, and there shall no strangers pass through her any more.
verses.verse_html:
17So shall ye know that I am the Lord your God dwelling in Zion, my holy mountain: then shall Jerusalem be holy, and there shall no strangers pass through her any more. ▼
▼ holy: Heb. holiness

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the mountains shall drop down new wine, and the hills shall flow with milk, and all the rivers of Judah shall flow with waters, and a fountain shall come forth of the house of the Lord, and shall water the valley of Shittim.
verses.verse_html:
18And it shall come to pass in that day, that the mountains shall drop down new wine, and the hills shall flow with milk, and all the rivers of Judah shall flow with waters, and a fountain shall come forth of the house of the Lord, and shall water the valley of Shittim. ▼
▼ flow: Heb. go

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in that day

verses.text_plain: Egypt shall be a desolation, and Edom shall be a desolate wilderness, for the violence against the children of Judah, because they have shed innocent blood in their land.
verses.verse_html: 19Egypt shall be a desolation, and Edom shall be a desolate wilderness, for the violence against the children of Judah, because they have shed innocent blood in their land.

verses.text_plain: But Judah shall dwell for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.
verses.verse_html:
20But Judah shall dwell for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation. ▼
▼ dwell: or, abide

verses.text_plain: For I will cleanse their blood that I have not cleansed: for the Lord dwelleth in Zion.
verses.verse_html:
21For I will cleanse their blood that I have not cleansed: for the Lord dwelleth in Zion. ▼
▼ for the…: or, even I the Lord that

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for the…: or, even I the Lord that
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for the…: or, even I the Lord that
